User Experience Design

I took a UX design course at SLAIS (LIBR 555: Information Systems: Design) to help me build knowledge and skills toward a systems or a related technical library career. For my final project, I explored a user experience design for a mobile-focused survey application.

Text Classification

I took a python programming course (LIBR 559C: Python Programming), again to prepare myself for a technical role in librarianship. As my final project, I classified over 1000 research papers using Non-Negative Matrix Factorization
